mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(RESERV_DATE, 'YYYY. MM. DD') RESERV_DATE, R.RESERV_TIME, S.STORE_NAME, R.RESERV_COUNT, S.STORE_LOCATION FROM RESERVATION R JOIN STORE S ON R.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO WHERE R.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND RESERV_STATUS_FL = 'Y' ORDER BY RESERV_DATE, RESERV_TIME
SELECT STORE_NAME, STORE_LOCATION FROM BOOKMARK B JOIN STORE S ON B.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
